mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs (studentid, studentname, title, createtime, detail, good) VALUES (#{studentid}, (SELECT name FROM user WHERE username=#{studentid}), #{title}, #{createtime}, #{detail}, #{good});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bbs b WHERE (SELECT grade FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{grade} AND (SELECT classno FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{classno} AND (SELECT collage FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{collage} AND (SELECT major FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{major} ORDER BY createtime DESC
SELECT * FROM bbs WHERE studentid=#{0} AND createtime=#{1}
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET good=good + 1 WHERE studentid=#{0} AND createtime=#{1}; INSERT INTO good (topicstudentid, createtime, goodstudentid) VALUES (#{0}, #{1}, #{2});
mapper.select: SELECT goodstudentid FROM good WHERE topicstudentid=#{0} AND createtime=#{1} AND goodstudentid=#{2}
